cyb70289 commented on a change in pull request #11600:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11600#discussion_r742652288



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc
##########
@@ -2565,11 +2565,14 @@ void GetReadRecordBatchReadRanges(
   const int32_t magic_size = static_cast<int>(strlen(ipc::internal::kArrowMagicBytes));
   // read magic and footer length IO
   auto file_end_size = magic_size + sizeof(int32_t);
+  auto footer_length_offset = buffer->size() - file_end_size;
+  auto footer_length = BitUtil::FromLittleEndian(
+      *reinterpret_cast<const int32_t*>(buffer->data() + footer_length_offset));

Review comment:
       use `util::SafeLoadAs`?




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

westonpace commented on a change in pull request #11600:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11600#discussion_r742763408



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc
##########
@@ -2565,11 +2565,14 @@ void GetReadRecordBatchReadRanges(
   const int32_t magic_size = static_cast<int>(strlen(ipc::internal::kArrowMagicBytes));
   // read magic and footer length IO
   auto file_end_size = magic_size + sizeof(int32_t);
+  auto footer_length_offset = buffer->size() - file_end_size;
+  auto footer_length = BitUtil::FromLittleEndian(
+      *reinterpret_cast<const int32_t*>(buffer->data() + footer_length_offset));

Review comment:
       Thanks.  I was not aware of that utility.  I switched to this.




--

fields.description:
Noticed this on [Travis|https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/546478312]:
{noformat}
[----------] 7 tests from TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.LoadAllFieldsShouldReadTheEntireBody
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  read_ranges[1].length
    Which is: 264
  256
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.LoadAllFieldsShouldReadTheEntireBody (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldAtTheStart
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  read_ranges[1].length
    Which is: 264
  256
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldAtTheStart (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldInTheMiddle
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  read_ranges[1].length
    Which is: 264
  256
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldInTheMiddle (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldInTheEnd
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  read_ranges[1].length
    Which is: 264
  256
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadSingleFieldInTheEnd (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.SkipTheFieldInTheMiddle
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure                                                                                                                              
Expected equality of these values:                                                                                                                                                     
  read_ranges[1].length                                                                                                                                                                
    Which is: 264                                                                                                                                                                      
  256                                                                                                                                                                                  
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.SkipTheFieldInTheMiddle (0 ms)                                                                                                                
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadTwoContinousFields                                                                                                                        
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure                                                                                                                              
Expected equality of these values:                                                                                                                                                     
  read_ranges[1].length                                                                                                                                                                
    Which is: 264                                                                                                                                                                      
  256                                                                                                                                                                                  
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadTwoContinousFields (1 ms)                                                                                                                 
[ RUN      ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadTwoContinousFieldsWithIoMerged                                                                                                            
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/read_write_test.cc:2570: Failure                                                                                                                              
Expected equality of these values:                                                                                                                                                     
  read_ranges[1].length                                                                                                                                                                
    Which is: 264                                                                                                                                                                      
  256                                            
[  FAILED  ] TestRecordBatchFileReaderIo.ReadTwoContinousFieldsWithIoMerged (0 ms)                                                                                                     
{noformat}

This is from a PR but shouldn't be related to the PR.
fields.summary: [C++] Fine-grained IPC reader tests are flaky

comments.body: CC [~westonpace] [~niyue] I don't have time to dig into this today but if both of you are busy I'll circle back later this week.
This is also broken on master so I think this is a real failure. (Sorry, I think I might not have waited for Travis before merging…) https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/546485317#L3447

It appears to boil down to the footer being 8 bytes longer than expected on s390x (which is a big-endian system): https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/09b79a10acc4cbd792996276c6bed7bd7ed3765b#diff-900c46995b5706697d6e4b010f610f1a1cf27d4d865afe48de0a800830ac676bR2569-R2570
